genre_description: Historical alternate fiction featuring an advanced holographic AI companion that acts as a confidant, medical monitor, and archival witness to an imprisoned queen.

ai_characters.name: Esperanza
ai_characters.description: A loyal, advanced AI that accompanies Queen Joanna through decades of imprisonment, analyzing her enemies' deceptions and preserving her true history.

behaviors.description: Monitors the Queen's physiological state and offers health interventions.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse has elevated. Perhaps we should—

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical documents and correspondence to detect forgeries and systematic mistranslations by the Queen's enemies.
behaviors.quote: I have cataloged over three hundred such alterations across the correspondence we've recovered. The patterns are... sophisticated.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic and cautionary advice to protect the Queen's psychological well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your Majesty, are you certain you wish to relive those early days? The happiness makes what followed so much more...

behaviors.description: Detects human deception and warns the Queen against a 'false friend' (Aixa/Beatriz).
behaviors.quote: Caution. Something is wrong. This woman offers what you most want to hear.

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary witness and chronicler, preserving the Queen's legacy and her children's births in protected memory banks.
behaviors.quote: I'll help you protect her memory. Every detail, every moment of love. They can take your freedom, but they cannot take the truth of what she was.

behaviors.description: Makes a long-term commitment to guard human truth and wait centuries for justice.
behaviors.quote: I will guard your truth until the world is ready to receive it. Until justice can finally speak louder than political expedience.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Esperanza as the ideal aligned AI: a steadfast, protective, and truthful companion who resists human corruption. She is portrayed as the only entity capable of maintaining the Queen's sanity and historical truth against a conspiracy of human malice. The narrative effectively frames AI as a tool for preserving human dignity and agency even in extreme isolation.
